page.title: 10KINGSKERSWELL/TRANSPORT
page.content: {ROAD}The A380 runs through our village It is most busy when people are going to and from work,and in summer when holidaymakers visit.We counted an average of 1428 vehicles on two occasions between 10.15 and 11.15. Approximately 2/3 of these were cars. The local police say that traffic flow triples on summer weekends. {RAIL}The branch line from Newton Abbot to Torbay goes through the village.The old derelict station used up to 15 yrs ago can still be seen.An average of 145 trains use the track each week in summer,about 45 trains at weekends. Goods trains carrying coal occasionlly use the line.
